objects.text:
• Japanese Quartz Movement
• Stainless Steel Construction
• Chronograph Function
• Water Resistant 30M

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a luxury wristwatch product in a contemporary and bold layout. The banner has a dark-themed background with layered geometric segments and semi-transparent circles for visual depth. Text layers are strategically placed on the left: the primary headline (`heading`) uses an eye-catching golden hue with a bold typeface, followed by a secondary headline (`subheading`) in large, strong serif font. Below that sits a detailed list of product features (`description`). The price (`price`) is highlighted boldly in gold, just above a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button`) featuring the text (`cta`). The wristwatch image (`product_image`) is prominently featured to the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Rich Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Soft Gray: `#E0E0E0`
- Off White: `#F5F5F5`
- Steel Gray: `#333333`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern wristwatch with an elegant monochromatic theme. The dominant color palette revolves around various shades of black and gray, creating a high-end, minimalistic aesthetic. Key colors include jet black (#0C0C0C), graphite gray (#2C2C2C), metallic silver (#B3B3B3), and a subtle gradient charcoal (#1F1F1F). The watch dial seamlessly blends matte and glossy textures to highlight the contours and features without overwhelming visual elements. The silver dials and indices subtly reflect light, acting as focal points amidst the darker tones. This refined palette, balanced with contrast, conveys sophistication and durability, ideal for an upscale advertisement banner.
